snippet: Inam Ur Raheem, who has challenged the tenure of Pakistan’s supreme military commander, has entered perilous waters at a time when the military leadership’s longstanding grip on power is being tested.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH
byline.contributor: Salman Masood reported from Rawalpindi, Pakistan, and Declan Walsh from Islamabad.

lead_paragraph: Inam Ur Raheem, who has challenged the tenure of Pakistan’s supreme military commander, has entered perilous waters at a time when the military leadership’s longstanding grip on power is being tested.

headline.seo: A Pakistani Lawyer Takes on the Army and Pays in Bruises
headline.main: A Pakistani Lawyer Takes On the Army and Pays in Bruises
headline.print_headline: A Pakistani Lawyer Takes on the Army and Pays in Bruises
